com.mcc.ul
Class DioExpInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.DioExpInfo

public class DioExpInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to retrieve information that describe the capabilities of the digital I/O subsystem on an Expansion device. To create an instance of this class, call the getExpInfo() method of the DioInfo class.

Method Summary
 int getFirstPortNum()
          Returns the first port number of the expansion device.
 int getNumPorts()
          Returns the number of ports on a digital I/O device.
 PortInfo getPortInfo(int portNum)
          Returns PortInfo for a given digital port.
